titleStmt.author: Pagit, Ephraim

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: Ineruditissmum D. Andr. Laurentij Tractatum Anglicè versum, .
analytic.author: Pagit, Ephraim

monogr.title: A discourse of the preseruation of the sight: of melancholike diseases; of rheumes, and of old age. Composed by M. Andreas Laurentius, ordinarie phisition to the King, and publike professor of phisicke in the Vniuersitie of Mompelier. Translated out of French into English, according to the last edition, by Richard Surphlet, practitioner in phisicke
monogr.author: Du Laurens, André

div.head:
Ineruditissmum D. Andr. Laurentij Tractatum Anglicè versum,
〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 .
div.l: DAs Surphlette tuis longaeuae munera vitae,
Quid melius nobis viuere vita dabit?
Obstas ne stygij per lurida transtra Charontis
Cumque dolent homine, illis das rite valer •
Omnia quid referam? neque enim bona nouimus illa:
Deficit ars artes sat celebrate tuas.
Hac mortale genus, licet, immortale videtur:
Si quid in hac vita, vincere fata valet.
